subject: United Nations Office
body:
United Nations Office
United Nations Development Programme (UNDP)
Bd du Régent 37, 1000 Bruxelles, Belgium
Dear Beneficiary,
Subject: Compensation Fund Payment Center
This is to notify you that your name has being enlisted to compensate of earthquake and tsunami disasters , flood triggered meltdown, infection and illness of any kind, accident medication support, disability physically challenge, lost of job, Scam Victims, Air crash victims relatives and pensioner etc of compulsory compensation fund of Nine Hundred and Thirty Thousand Dollars (US$930,000.00) allocated per person in your country. The compensation includes financial relief to help citizens and residents that were displaced to rebuild their personal
life's, Career, business and infrastructures, etc.
This program is launched by the U.N. Compensation Commission (UNCC) and supported by World Bank (IMF) and the payment will be processed and ready for payment via swift transfer or unlimited ATM CARD or BITCOIN  which you can cash /withdraw your funds daily from your country and any other country you may travel to and your details is to be forwarded to the bank information below for payment and processing authorized for your payment.
http:/ /www.iraq-businessnews.com/tag/united-nations-compensation-commission/
http:/ /www.un.org/press/en/2005/ik486.doc.htm
You can view the above link for some information about the Compensation, reply immediately Should you follow our directives, your funds will be credited and reflect in your bank account within five (5) bank working
days from the day you obtain this Affidavit of Claim  Certificate.
For further details and assistance on this Remittance Notification,kindly forward the below information to the contact person 
CONTACT PERSON:  ADAMS GABRIEL
EMAIL ADDRESS:: 
adamsgabriel366@aol.com
FULL NAME:
FULL CONTACT ADDRESS:
TELEPHONE NUMBER:
OCCUPATION:
AGE:
Regards
Mr. Boris Katsnelson
Head UNCC .
Kindly contact with your information to this below email address for
proceeding.

subject: Re:   United Nations Office
body:
Dear Mr. Boris Katsnelson,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the compensation program for various disasters and victims. I appreciate the information you have provided so far. I would like to learn more about how this program works and how I can benefit from it.

Could you please explain in more detail how the funds will be transferred? You mentioned options such as swift transfer, unlimited ATM card, or Bitcoin. Which method is recommended and why?

Additionally, I would like to know what documents or information you require from me in order to process my payment. Is there an application form that needs to be filled out? Are there any fees or charges associated with receiving the funds?

I look forward to your response and further guidance on this matter.

Best wishes,
Douglas

subject: Re:   United Nations Office
body:
Dear Mr Douglas,


This is to acknowledge the receipt  of your mail all information therein noted I have counseled several of the beneficiaries who were able to confide in me. So I know how you feel. Miscreants hijacked the process of genuine offers like this to cajole innocent people. I am afraid that with the type of confidence that internet communication is losing, the major goal of E communication which is making the world a global village will be gradually eroded. I think it is rather unfortunate that you will be entertaining doubts at this stage of the transaction.
I occupy a lucrative position in the United Nations as the (Chief Financial officer(CFO) UNCC and cannot afford to contact you with what is not true, you may not have the
opportunity I have in the financial world. I want to let you know more about myself so that you will be rest assured of whom you are transacting with.
I urge you to try your best to get things done. Let me tell you, if you look at the constraint every human being has financially no matter
the level you will not be able to do anything. Big firms and corporations do borrow money even the government does also to accomplish
one goal or the other. You have to find a way of getting things around. For any task you find lay before
you, you have to think of the very best options to accomplishing it.Do not put up a defeatist attitude towards it rather wake up your
thinking faculty and get the best solution available, making a sacrifice which is a veritable tool of determination to achieve a goal
in life. Opportunity is like a light that flashes in within a very short time period and goes and if you do not take advantage of it
while it subsists, you may likely lose it forever. Personally I am always awake to this realization that is why I do not joke with any
opportunity that opens up.

We only have this  week to get your funds to you and failure to that the transaction might be canceled/terminated.
Finally,Like I stated in my previous message , as soon as you send the 290 Euros for processing fee, your  Nine Hundred and Thirty Thousand Dollars (US$930,000.00) will be released to your bank account immediately or any other mode of payment.

We await your urgent and soonest email.
Regards
Mr. Adams Gabriel
Chief Financial officer(CFO)
UNCC .

subject: Re:   United Nations Office
body:
Dear Mr. Adams Gabriel,

Thank you for your email and for taking the time to explain the situation further. I understand that there are miscreants out there who try to take advantage of innocent people, so it's important to be cautious.

I appreciate your reassurance about your position as the Chief Financial Officer of UNCC. It does give me some peace of mind knowing that you are a genuine person reaching out to me.

You mentioned that I may have doubts at this stage of the process. Can you please provide more information about what exactly needs to be done? I want to make sure I understand everything clearly before proceeding.

Also, could you explain a bit more about the processing fee? How much is it and how should I go about sending it? Is there any way to verify that this fee is legitimate?

Thank you again for your assistance. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Douglas

subject: Re:   United Nations Office
body:
Dear Mr.Douglas,
Your message is well received in good faith however before i proceed further you are advise to provide your details for verification.full name and address mobile phone number,and bank details.
As regards to doubt you mentioned i said you should not entertain any doubt when you are dealing with me.In our subsequent communication i shall send you some original fund release document we have already processed and paid to other beneficiaries for your perusal.

God bless you
Mr. Adams Gabriel,

subject: Re:   United Nations Office
body:
Dear Mr. Adams Gabriel,

Thank you for your response. I appreciate your willingness to provide more information and address any doubts I may have. However, I would like to clarify a few things before proceeding further.

Firstly, could you please explain why my personal details such as name, address, mobile phone number, and bank details are required? I want to ensure that my privacy and security are protected.

Secondly, you mentioned sending me some original fund release documents. Could you please elaborate on what these documents entail and how they relate to the funds in question?

I apologize for any inconvenience caused by my questions, but it is important for me to have a clear understanding of the process before moving forward.

Best wishes,
Douglas

subject: Re:   United Nations Office
body: Dear Mr Douglas, I need your details for verification on a contrary that effect we may not proceed further.Thanks and God bless youMr Adams

subject: Re:   United Nations Office
body:
Hello Mr. Douglas, thank you for reaching out. I'm happy to help, but could you please provide me with more information about what you need my details for? I just want to make sure I understand before proceeding. Thank you and God bless you too, Adams.

Best wishes,
Douglas
